md:
giải nghĩa từ "experience" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Experience** (noun)

* Meaning: the process of getting knowledge or skill from doing, seeing, or feeling things
* Example: "I have a lot of experience in teaching English."
* Related words: skill, knowledge, practice, training

**Experience** (verb)

* Meaning: to feel or undergo something
* Example: "I experienced a lot of pain after the surgery."
* Related words: feel, undergo, suffer, enjoy

**Experience** (adjective)

* Meaning: having a lot of knowledge or skill from doing something
* Example: "He is an experienced teacher."
* Related words: skilled, knowledgeable, expert, trained
html:
giải nghĩa từ "experience" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Experience (noun)

  • Meaning: the process of getting knowledge or skill from doing, seeing, or feeling things
  • Example: "I have a lot of experience in teaching English."
  • Related words: skill, knowledge, practice, training

Experience (verb)

  • Meaning: to feel or undergo something
  • Example: "I experienced a lot of pain after the surgery."
  • Related words: feel, undergo, suffer, enjoy

Experience (adjective)

  • Meaning: having a lot of knowledge or skill from doing something
  • Example: "He is an experienced teacher."
  • Related words: skilled, knowledgeable, expert, trained
